mapper.insert: insert into cardboard(seq,title,nickname,topic,location,people,content,open,registDate) values((select *from (select max(seq)+1 from cardboard) next),#{title},#{nickname},#{topic},#{location},#{people},#{content},default,now())
mapper.select: select * from cardboard order by seq desc limit #{startList},#{listSize};
SELECT count(*) as listCnt FROM cardboard
select substring_index(location,' ',-1) from addr where location like concat(#{location},'%')
select * from cardboard where topic like concat('%',#{topic}) order by seq desc;
select rseq, seq, reply, nickname, regDate, editDate from cardBoardReply where seq=#{seq}
mapper.insert: insert into cardBoardReply(rseq,seq,reply,nickname,regdate,editdate) values((select *from (select max(rseq)+1 from cardBoardReply) next),#{seq},#{reply},#{nickname},now(),now())
mapper.update: update cardBoardReply set reply=#{reply}, editdate=now() where rseq=#{rseq}
update cardboard set replys=replys+1 where seq=#{seq}
